body.p: I received a letter from you some time since but have been obliged to delay answering it on a/c account of an accident which happened to me about that time. I got the thumb of my right hand in to some Cog Wheels and smashed it pretty fine so that I have not been able to do anything since nor am I likely to be able for a month yet.
At what time do you expecte to visit New York this Summer if at all.
My thumb is very Painful so that I can not cannot write much at present but will do so as soon as it gets well. My family are all well.
